newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh call rate up at 6-8 pct on thin supply.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh call rate up at 6-8 pct on thin supply.

text.p: Bangladesh call money rates opened up at 6.0 percent to 8.0 percent on Thursday from previous closing of 5.5-6.5 percent on liquidity shortfall, dealers said.
The call rates soared as the liquidity position of the banks strained after they bought Bangladesh (central) Bank bills worth 4.0 billion taka on Monday, dealers said.
They said the opening rates were wide but it was expected to narrow down to close at around seven to eight percent.
